Generation III.Ruby: Exploud triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this Pok é mon violently inhales from the ports on its body, it's a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
Generation III.Sapphire: Exploud communicates its feelings to the others by emitting whistle-like sounds from the tubes on its body. This Pok é mon only raises its voice when it is in battle.
Generation III.Emerald: It has sound-generating organs all over its body. It communicates with others by adjusting the tone and volume of the cries it emits.
Generation III.FireRed: It emits a variety of sounds from the holes all over its body. Its loud cries can be heard from over six miles away.
